# presentationContextProvider

**Instance Property**

A delegate that provides a display context in which the system can present an authorization interface to the user.

## Declaration

```swift
weak var presentationContextProvider: (any ASAuthorizationControllerPresentationContextProviding)? { get set }
```

## Presenting requests

- **ASAuthorizationControllerPresentationContextProviding**: An interface the controller uses to ask a delegate for a presentation context.
